name: tree
description: Display directories as trees (with optional color/HTML output)

readme.summary: This README is almost entirely a credits/changelog file with minimal user-facing documentation, lacking basic usage examples, configuration details, and installation instructions beyond a reference to a separate INSTALL file.
readme.top_issue: No quick start or usage examples - users cannot learn what the tool does or how to use it from this README alone

injection_risks.description: Use of snprintf with user-controlled data
Use of sprintf with user-controlled data

critical_findings: Potential buffer overflow vulnerability in split function
Use of user-controlled data without proper validation
security.summary: The code has some security concerns, including potential injection risks and lack of input validation, but no critical secrets or error exposure issues were found.

common_complaints: Pattern matching inconsistencies (globstar behavior differs from standard tools)
Edge cases in path handling (OSC 8 hyperlinks, symlinks with -f/-l flags)
Missing feature requests for tree filtering and collapsing
praise_themes: Tool is appreciated and widely used
sentiment.summary: Healthy but slow-moving project with engaged users reporting genuine bugs and thoughtful feature requests, though maintainer responsiveness appears limited with several open issues from 2025-2026 still unaddressed.

red_flags: lack of enthusiasm for new contributors
communication.summary: The maintainer provides detailed technical explanations, but can come across as dismissive and unenthusiastic about feature requests and new contributors.

concerns: No commits in past 6 months despite last commit being over a year old
14 open issues with no recent activity or resolution
No closed issues in past 6 months indicating lack of maintenance
No merged PRs in past 6 months showing no active development
No active contributors in past 6 months
Unknown last release date suggests release information may be outdated
positive_signals: Project exists and has historical commit activity
maintenance.summary: The tree package is stale with no maintenance activity for over 6 months and 14 unresolved open issues.

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is lacking in clarity, installation instructions, and troubleshooting guidance, making it difficult for new users to get started.
concerns: no commits in the past 6 months
unmerged open PRs and unresolved issues
Docs: Lack of clear and concise installation instructions and quick start examples
Communication: lack of enthusiasm for new contributors
Security: Potential buffer overflow vulnerability in split function
Security: Use of user-controlled data without proper validation
High bus factor risk (100% from top contributor)
highlights: 1 contributor active in the past 6 months
